featured.text: Performers usually play on a tall stage with lanterns and banners strung all around.
33 Paper lanterns and offerings are sent floating down rivers to accompany the ancestors back to their resting place.

definition.zh_def: 燈籠，一種用來照明的裝置，通常由透明材料製成，並且可以手持或懸掛。
definition.en_def: A lantern is a portable light source, typically made of transparent material, used for illumination and often designed to be carried or hung.
definition.example: We lit the lantern to guide our way through the dark forest.
